ProductInfo.Features:
16-CH H.264 Advance Video Compression Technology. User Friendly Graphic User Interface.
Mobile Remote Monitoring- iPhone, 3g, PDA, Mobile Windows 5, 6 Compactable. USB2.0 Flash Disk file backup (Flash Disk Not included).
Network Audio, voice and live Monitoring. Multiple We Browsers support- IE, Firefox, Chrome, Safari etc...
Camera Features: Aluminum housing with IP68 (waterproof) rating, perfect solution for day/night applications. 24 Hours Surveillance .
420 TV Lines, sony High Resolution CCD Sensor. 28 High Efficiency IR LED with radiant distance 66FT.
ProductInfo.Name: LILIN LHS-DVR216-8KIT 16 Channel Digital Video Recorder with Network Capability H.264, 8 IR Camera and Pre-installed 500 GB Hard Drive
